description: This collection contains terms lifted from a textbook aimed at teaching first-language speakers to read and write the syllabary.

externalResources.name: Online self-study course from Cherokee Nation
externalResources.notes: You must make a free account to view the book here

externalResources.name: Cherokee Nation Language Department Homepage
externalResources.notes: Has many great free resources, including posters and other print outs.

externalResources.name: Book download with audio from Cherokee Nation
externalResources.notes: Download your copy of the See Say Write textbook. Try printing out exercise pages to practice writing!
